long_description: When the cold moves in, pull out the flattering REI Chilly Parka. Its extended length and sleek down insulation offer superb warmth. Water-repellent 700-fill-power goose down in quilted baffles offers all-conditions warmth to keep winter's cold at bay. Shell has a Durable Water Repellent finish and resists wind to 50 mph; the tall collar softly warms your neck. 2-way front zipper eases the fit and adjusts ventilation. Cozy knit cuffs seal out drafts. 2 zip hand pockets and 2 snap-flap patch pockets; the inner pocket has a cord port. REI Chilly Parka features a classic, easy-wearing fit.
short_description: When the cold moves in, pull out the flattering REI Chilly Parka. Its extended length and sleek down insulation offer superb warmth.
